title: Data Entry & Office Assistant
description: Assist with data entry and basic office tasks in a local government office. No prior experience needed.

title: Software Development Intern
description: Work on real-world projects with a team of experienced developers. Ideal for engineering students.

title: Community Outreach Intern
description: Engage with communities and help coordinate social projects in urban slums. A great role for arts and social science students.

title: Content Writing Intern
description: Create engaging content for social media and blogs. A perfect fit for a student with strong language skills.

title: Financial Planning Intern
description: Assist financial planners with research and data analysis. Great for commerce and finance students.
